# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O common-services-drivermanager-1.0.0-RC1.zip https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1057/org/openo/common-services/driver-mgr/drivermanager-service-deployment/1.0.0-RC1/drivermanager-service-deployment-1.0.0-RC1.zip && unzip -q -o -B common-services-drivermanager-1.0.0-RC1.zip && rm -f common-services-drivermanager-1.0.0-RC1.zip
EXPOSE 8103
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0-RC1 autorelease-1057 > VERSION
